> =A0
> "I am Megatron, where and who are you? Why does a voice disturb me =
in my own fortress?" he demanded, his recharge bay springing to life. It ha=
d prepared to disengage, several mechanisms primed to fire and literally ej=
ect him from the bay. A security shutter that blocked the view from the alc=
ove to the medical bay retracted, allowing him to loock crosswise into the =
bay and see the console monitoring his guest spark.
> 
> 

An eerie silence=
 that hung about the vicinity; absolute stillness. No sound for a moment. B=
ut soon that silence was broken by a ghostly, barely audible childlike gigg=
le followed by silence once more. 

After a minute, the silence was broken =
by barely audible multiple whispers. 

"Help me?" a femme's voice was heard=
 in the eerie silence.
The fiery spark pulsed as it rose up just slightly b=
efore it floated out of it's containment, passing through anything like a g=
host, as it floated towards Megatron X. 

Rising vertically just mere inche=
s from around his feet... his legs... torso... til finally the spark was op=
tic level as it hovered there, slightly pulsing. As though studying Megatro=
n X's faceplate; hard to tell if the faceplate was familiar, if it was read=
ing his meta-processor or observing for some other reason. One may never kn=
ow. 

Until the spark shot towards Megatron X, the spark disappeared into h=
is cranuim. Within moments, the unknown fiery spark merged with the spark o=
f Megatron X.. downloading or uploading or 'giving' Megatron X memories, em=
otions, secrets, anything that most would not know unless seen from the poi=
nt of view of another. That other was the femme known as Maxima. Flashes of=
 memories going back from last she was functional as a Beast Machine, meeti=
ng and falling for Hydra whom she believed was Megatron in some future form=
... all the way back to when she was a Military Aide to Gamma Quadran, back=
 when she first met the real Megatron following a gladiator event.
Emotions=
, fears, courage, triumphs, battles, all those she knew, and more all left =
within Megatron X's spark. 

As soon as it happened, within seconds - thoug=
h it seemed to have lasted several minutes - the unknown fiery spark emerge=
d swiftly from the chestplate of Megatron X... and just hovered there befor=
e him. 
Whispers once more, ghostly in a reverse echo, a femme's voice, dee=
p, soft yet with sultry malice, "Iam-I am-Max-I-Ma-" words overlapping as t=
hough barely understoon. "I am Maxima" finally was pronounced over and over=
 as the words overlapped one another.
